mapper.select: SELECT blog_article_info.id, author, article_title, GROUP_CONCAT( blog_sort.sort_name ) AS sorts, image_url, blog_article_info.create_by FROM ( ( ( blog_article_info LEFT JOIN blog_article_content ON blog_article_info.id = blog_article_content.article_id ) LEFT JOIN blog_article_image ON blog_article_info.id = blog_article_image.article_id ) LEFT JOIN blog_info_sort ON blog_article_info.id = blog_info_sort.article_id ) LEFT JOIN blog_sort ON blog_info_sort.sort_id = blog_sort.id WHERE blog_article_info.is_delete = 0 AND article_title LIKE CONCAT( CONCAT( '%',#{searchKey}), '%') GROUP BY blog_article_info.id ORDER BY blog_article_info.create_by DESC
